description:
In this course, we will talk about dog body language. This will help you to understand better and communicate more efficietly with our dog.

In order to do this, it is necessary to understand some aspects of communication both humans and between human and dogs.

At first, I will learn to understand the main moods through dog's body language.

I will analyse different body parts of dogs and I will show you the correct and incorrect approach.

At the end ,I will teach you how to decode quickly dog's signals and avoid unpleasant fights.

The course is made to be understood by anyone, with several photos and videos to show you different dog's moods.

At the end of every lesson, I will always suggest you some interesting books to read,
in order to undestand dog body language.
title: Dog body language. How To Read Your Dog's Body Language
